Meta.title: AILangaugeCoach
Meta.description: When learning a language but not sure where to find effective practice and proficiency tests? AI language coach can help you solve these problems and improve learning efficiency.

Index.title: Let AI help you practice your Language!!
Index.description: When learning a language but not sure where to find effective practice and proficiency tests? AI language coach can help you solve these problems and improve learning efficiency.
Index.introTitle: Here are a few ways AI Language Coach can help

introduction1.title: Customized Practice Mode
introduction1.description: You can choose different language certification levels to do exercises and provide explanations in your native language.

introduction2.title: Various situational dialogue exercises
introduction2.description: Provide situational dialogues including daily life, business, travel, social interaction, etc.

setup.title: Setup your language test
setup.nlangLabel: Your native Langauge (to explain the answer)

ansModal.title: Welcome to practice area
ansModal.description: Hi, I am your AI language coach.Next, I will generate fill-in-the-blank language exercises according to your settings. I will help you answer and explain each question, so letâ€™s start when you are ready.

FAQInfo1.title: What is AI Language Coach?
FAQInfo1.description: AI Language Coach is a web application combined with chatGPT. We simplify the mode of communicating with AI and provide a variety of language exercises to help you learn languages with less effort.

FAQInfo2.title: Who is AI Language Coach for?
FAQInfo2.description: At present, it is mainly provided for those who have basic language skills but want to improve in the future and prepare to obtain relevant language certificates.

FAQInfo3.title: What's next for AI language coach?
FAQInfo3.description: Project news can be obtained through the following social platforms

other.loginByGoogle: Please log in with google account
